dialogue.user: Can we talk about launching our Ayurveda soap and shampoo?
dialogue.app: Sure, we’ve finished the product recipes and packaging.

dialogue.user: That’s great. Any problems we need to fix?
dialogue.app: We need to make sure all products pass safety standards and get certified.

dialogue.user: Let’s focus on getting the certifications first.

dialogue.app: Our pre-launch campaign is getting a lot of interest and good feedback.

dialogue.user: Fantastic! Let’s keep up the excitement.
